text: Altererythrobacter xixiisoli is a Gram-negative, aerobic and non-motile bacterium from the genus of Altererythrobacter which has been isolated from soil from the Xixi wetland from China. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Altererythrobacter xixiisoli at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Sphingomonadales Category:Bacteria described in 2017
title: Altererythrobacter xixiisoli
